name: Sailor Pop
description: Start playing and put on a swimsuit to join the brave sailor and the beautiful mermaid in this epic underwater adventure.  In a fun puzzle game collapse.  In this game task is to match at least two fish of the same color to free diamonds.  Complete the objective of each level and try to get as many more stars as possible to unlock new map pages.  Take advantage of cool boosters to get more points for success to the next level.  Find and store hidden diamonds and discover the treasure of the blue lagoon too.  So, are you ready to play diving in real life like in this game, let's try it in this game.
